name: Okulab - educational platform
description:
Educational platform that is available for any person willing to learn more about inclusive education, online children safety topics. Platform is willing to expand with new courses related to different topics that will be helpful to anyone. 
After creating the account one can see his/her progress, make bookmarks and  so on. 
Platform information is available in 3 languages and the sign language translation is also available. There are 2 modes for the convenience of the users: light mode and dark mode.

protectionFromHarassment.harassmentPolicy: Online platform provide features to help protect users from harassment, such as moderator and administrator. Moderators are responsible for monitoring user-generated content, enforcing community guidelines, and taking appropriate actions against harassment or abusive behavior. Administrators, on the other hand, have higher-level access and can manage the platform's settings, users, and overall functionality.

privacy.privacyComplianceURL:
Websites meets the following three principles:

-The content on the website is available to everyone;
-The information provided by the website is comprehensible and easy to use for people with disabilities; and
-It’s easy to navigate from page to page without being disoriented by the layout or navigation elements.
